name: 2 Worlds!
description:
A 2D platformer in which you overcome many different obstacles by switching between 2 joined worlds! I recommend playing in fullscreenmode!

Controls:

"A/D" for moving, "Space" for jumping, "Shift" to switch worlds, "S" while wallsliding to slide down faster, "Left Click" to pick up and throw crates.

Not all assets are directly made by me, here are the links to them: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer, https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html
